description.value:
Humans who live in environments that lack regular exposure to bright natural light, such as the sunset cities of tidally locked @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.Item.f24qKgU5Wh5LLJyh]{Verces} or Aballonian underground compounds, adapt to their surroundings as best they can. Humans with this species trait have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#low-light-vision]{Low-Light Vision} and a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} checks.

This replaces skilled.
